channel.title: CVE Feed for Irfanview -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Irfanview -- all products

item.title: CVE-2013-3944|2024-08-06T16:30:48.201Z -- irfanview -- mrsid%20plugin
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the MrSID plugin (MrSID.dll) before 4.37 for IrfanView allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an IMAGE tag.

item.title: CVE-2013-3946|2024-08-06T16:30:49.080Z -- irfanview -- mrsid%20plugin
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the MrSID plugin (MrSID.dll) before 4.37 for IrfanView allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a levels header.

item.title: CVE-2013-3945|2024-08-06T16:30:48.178Z -- irfanview -- mrsid%20plugin
item.description: The MrSID plugin (MrSID.dll) before 4.37 for IrfanView allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a nband tag.
